channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2024021310
item.description:
Report X-2024021310

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED AS A LEAKER ON MIDNIGHT SORT. OUTER PACKAGE HAD BEEN SATURATED WITH RAINWATER BUT WAS NOT LEAKING ITSELF. WHEN A CLERK WENT TO REBOX IT THEY NOTICED THE INNER BOX WAS HAZ MARKED BUT DIDN'T HAVE SHIPPING PAPERS.

item.title: Report X-2024021473
item.description:
Report X-2024021473

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-19
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: VENTED CAPS LEAKING DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: VENTED CAPS LEAKING CORROSIVE OXIDIZER SOILING THE BOX AND ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
